Detailed Description

Superclass to Readers.

Introduced to avoid that the reader enqueues packets in the packet queue without updating certain things, e.g. MapSafeVector.

Definition at line 38 of file ReaderBase.h.

Member Function Documentation

void ReaderBase::enqueue (  Packet *  p  )  [private]
 

Puts the packet into the queue to the processor.

Also checks if the packet is LoadMapRequestPacket or DeleteMapRequestPacket and updates MapSafeVector.

Definition at line 91 of file ReaderBase.h.

void ReaderBase::sendAndDeletePacket (  Packet *  p,
const IPnPort &  dest
)  [protected]
 

Sends a packet using TCP if the packet is large or UDP if it is small enough.

Uses Packet::TCP_LIMIT_SIZE to choose protocol. Enqueues the packet in the queue if the receiver is == own address.

Parameters:
p The packet to send. Will be deleted.
dest Destination ip and port.
